tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: What if the Earth were Hollow?
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Link to keep watching over on Vsauce's channel RIGHT HERE: www.youtube.com What if there were a tunnel through the middle of the earth and you jumped in? Also, explore a map of the big bang! www.bigbangregistry.com MinutePhysics is on Google+ - http And facebook - facebook.com And twitter - @minutephysics Minute Physics provides an energetic and entertaining view of old and new problems in physics -- all in a minute! Music by Nathaniel Schroeder Thanks to Nima Doroud for contributions and to Perimeter Institute for support. www.perimeterinstitute.ca

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: believing in﻿ hell is stupid, come on man.
yup. and﻿ i think XRA6661X was just joking.
Wait, so The Fall in Total Recall could be﻿ REAL? :O
i thought this channel was going to﻿ be about the physics of really small things
Also, reading your first comment, the direction of gravity changes due to the amount of mass. Law of Universal Gravitation, read﻿ into that.
What?... You﻿ mean quantum physics?
fukin abs ﻿

Jesus died, rose from the dead, and told us there was a hell; however, not in the way most people might think. The language the New Testament was written in: Greek, the mythology of Hades and the underworld was so ingrained into the﻿ language that Sheol (from the Hebrew language used in the Old Testament that Jesus would have referred to) which literally means gravedom) was not properly transferred into the English texts, and thus the misinterpretation that Hell is a place of eternal suffering.
HELP I am stuck in an infinite loop. These videos never end!﻿ link﻿ paradox!
Dear Minutephysics, why a﻿ circle seems to slow down and rotate in the opposite direction when reaching a certain speed?
tell me﻿ any way that there could be a hell that's not from a man written book
why u replace asterisk﻿ for r
no... minute physics ﻿
Even still,there would still be﻿ skeptics.
There's plenty of﻿ videos, interviews, and stories of people who "came back from Hell". Just saying.
There are so many things that would prevent these results from taking place if the conditions﻿ were so, but cool nonetheless.
I wasn't proving﻿ anything, I was just telling him that because of his opinions he doesn't deserve to call others dumbasses.
yeah! I watched both videos like 6﻿ times before realizing it was a repeat..

This is a hypothetical scenario in ideal circumstances, not natural circumstances. Yes, in real life﻿ this whole scenario would be implausible, but under their circumstances that they specified, this works, and will be the way it works.

So, because he believes opposite of you, YOU believe that YOU have the right to call HIM a dumb ass? Wow.. Ignorance at its finest. Take a minute to reread what you've said and focus on how contradicting your whole concept﻿ was..
No.... phinute﻿ mysics.

Reviewer.Books: I prefere not to thank you
Reviewer.School: CMIS, JKCS, King's masting public school, Garthwood public school.
